DOC.detailed_description: Insufficient evidence support feasibility efficacy current nutritional recommendation prevent obesity . The purpose study test hypothesis family dietary coaching would improve nutritional intake health indicator free-living child adult . Intervention : 1013 participate family ( 1013 child 1013 parent ) randomly assign Group A ( advice reduce fat increase complex carbohydrate ) , Group B ( advice reduce fat sugar increase complex carbohydrate ) control group ( advice ) . GA GB receive monthly phone counsel Internet-based monitoring . Main outcome measure change nutritional intake body mass index throughout intervention child adult . Secondary outcome include change fat mass , physical activity , fast blood indicator food-related quality life .
